4302160.name: F.A.R.M.S.: Chill Factory
4302160.description:
F.A.R.M.S. : Chill Factory is an automation simulation game you can enjoy at your own pace.
Build complex production lines, optimize efficiency, and accelerate production with a click. There are no enemy raids and no strict time limits. It is just you, a vast factory, and infinite possibilities through technological research.

üè≠ Total Freedom in Factory Design

Design your dream factory with intuitive controls.
With the "Link System," simply drag and connect machine ports to complete your production lines. Say goodbye to frustrating directional restrictions.
Furthermore, by using "Relays (Waypoints)," you can route connections around obstacles to create beautiful, organized wiring. The game also features a Batch Edit Tool, allowing you to move or delete multiple machines at once, making large-scale layout changes stress-free.

üå≤ Evolve Your Factory with the "Tech Tree"

Invest your produced items and earnings to unlock nodes in the Tech Tree.
The path of growth is up to you: unlock new production machines, upgrade existing ones, speed up conveyor belts, or expand convenient system features.
Experience the satisfaction of evolving your facility into a highly advanced, efficient mega-factory through step-by-step upgrades.

‚ö° Push the Limits! "Boost System"

This isn't a factory you just watch. Your "clicks" dramatically change production efficiency.
Click on machines to fill the "Boost Gauge" and accelerate operation speeds in real-time.

  • Lv.1 (Green): 1.25x Speed

  • Lv.2 (Blue): 1.5x Speed

  • Lv.3 (Orange): 2.0x Speed!

The gauge decreases over time, allowing you to actively intervene by rapid-clicking to clear bottlenecks when it matters most.

üç£ From Iron Ingots... to Sushi!?

Advance your technology to unlock new recipes.
You aren't limited to heavy industrial products. Manufacture everything from classic auto parts and construction materials to growing wheat for Cakes, and even fresh Sushi!
Manage diverse production chains and build a production hub that meets every demand.

Key Features

  • Stress-Free Automation: No enemy raids. Just a relaxed, "chill" gameplay experience.

  • Flexible Network Building: Create free-form lines using Relays (Waypoints) without worrying about conveyor directions.

  • Tech Tree Progression: A deep progression system where you invest resources to gradually unlock and strengthen machines and features.

  • Active Intervention: Control factory productivity directly by clicking to Boost.

  • Unique Products: Manufacture a wide range of items, from pistons and construction kits to sweets and sushi.

Now, build the world's best factory with the power of automation and your strategy!
